member.summary: Reservation is pending approval from the business owner

member.summary: Reservation was denied by the business owner and is no longer valid.

member.summary: Reservation is currently being used and is in progress

member.summary: Reservation is completed and was used

member.name: F:OmegaSpot.Common.ReservationStatus.CANCELLED
member.summary: Reservation was cancelled (either by business or reservation owner) and is no longer valid
